channel.title: Docker on Made by Nathan
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Made by Nathan

item.title: Docker Saved My Blog
item.description: I haven’t written any blog posts for a while. One reason is that I’ve been hard at work on DocSpring for the last few years, and I haven’t had a lot of time to work on personal projects. But the main reason is that my blog uses an older version of Hugo, which is a “static site generator” 1. I switched from Jekyll to Hugo in 2017, and the current version of Hugo at the time was 0.
